title: In need of a club, only level 25 but need people to play with, adc player.

replies.body: yo man, add me jojojamiev2 and ill invite you to my club that i built, we have several lvl 30s and alot of other loyal players, we play together when we can.{{champion:238}}
what are clubs and why do u need one

Club: A blunt weapon used by Trundle to beat you're a** into shape~
Not sure if you're serious; so here
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/social.html

As for why you need one?
You don't.
But the game's a lot more fun with friends... 
Or at the very least people you can count on not to afk xD
